net.minecraftforge.client.model.pipeline

类 VertexBufferConsumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.client.model.pipeline.VertexBufferConsumer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IVertexConsumer

    public class VertexBufferConsumer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IVertexConsumer
    Assumes VertexFormatElement is present in the BufferBuilder's vertex format.
